translations: 不足取的；无价值的；琐碎的；卑鄙的

sentences.sentence: He received a paltry annuity of $100.
sentences.translation: 他收到了微不足道的100美元年金。

sentences.sentence: This account offers a paltry 1% return on your investment.
sentences.translation: 这个账户给你投资的回报仅是微不足道的1%。

sentences.sentence: Ye paltry cowards, and arm yourselves and guard the doors, whilst I send one to fetch the watch!
sentences.translation: 你们这些没用的懦夫，武装起来，守住那些门，我派一个人去叫卫兵！
